Summary: Bright orange flashing light, then alternating white/orange. Low, no noise, slow, followed by helicopter.
divs: sighting detailsi keep trying to rationalize this in my mind. after observing the same area of sky for a while i am still finding that this was not a normal aircraft. i am not good at judging or remembering exact times or days. like most females i can tell you details about the landmarks on a route but don't know the street names or distances for a familiar route. that being said... i was so e time between 8:30ish pm and 11:00 pm on tuesday, june 22. i went out several times that evening to relax with my kitty. i stepped out onto my porch to call my cat. as i stood facing west, i noticed a larger than normal and extreamly bright orange flashing light to my left, south. i walked over to the south of my patio onto the grass to keep sight of it. i watched as the object appeared to decend while traveling north\east. it leveled off and continued heading east. at that point the extreamly bright orange light was alternating with a white light. it flew lower than the other helicopters in the air that night. when i was walking to the south of my yard to keep it in sight, i felt an unsettling feeling because it made no noise. as it continued east i lost sight of it since it was flying so low. at about the time that i began to loose sight of it, i noticed a second light traveling roughly the same path. i quickly recognized the second craft as a helicopter. it had different light colors and normal flashing lights as well as being noisey. it turned to go in the same direction as the orange lighted craft went. the second craft was also flying at the usual height and i also noted that it moved less smoothly than the first craft. my mind wants to associate the first craft as a helicopter, but the peculiars of the first craft were unlike everything that i normally see. we have a lot of air traftc around our home. i have always enjoyed gazing at the sky and the clouds, aircraft or stars. i have never ever seen such a bright and very orange light. i searched the web trying to find a type of aircraft that uses an orange light like it, but found nothing as far as legitimate crafts that have such a light. this was bright, larger than normal at durring the evening hours that people are up and about. if anyone else in northern phoenix saw this or knows what it was, please post your description too. it did not occur to me to get my camera because i was fixed on keeping my eye on the weird light.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around June 22nd 2010
